body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good morning! This is Kenneth Alexander from Harmony Music School. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello Michelle! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm a bit nervous to mention this, but I've had some issues with the product quality of the lessons I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Michelle. We aim for the highest quality in our lessons. Could you provide me with two pieces of personal information for verification purposes, please? Your birth date and your enrollment number.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my birth date is April 2nd, one nine eight six, and my enrollment number is S one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Michelle. I have pulled up your records. We take issues with product quality very seriously. I will personally ensure that we get to the bottom of this. Is there anything specific you can tell me about the issue?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, it seems that the practical sessions aren't as interactive and engaging as promised.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Rest assured, we will take the necessary steps to address this issue. We value your feedback and are committed to improvement.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Kenneth. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's my pleasure, Michelle. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will be in touch with a solution soon. Thank you for your time, and have a great day!
